Couple of things: 1. No pictures of the front were advertised which lead me to believe the front was blank. When it arrived I saw what looked like a misspelling of “spider” but after reading other reviews, I’ve learned that this design was stolen and the original creator “starry sonder” put their signature on the front. So please direct your purchase toward the actual designer 2. the zipper goes all the way up the hood which I wish was advertised because that’s not what I was personally looking for 3. The zipper is poor quality and will likely break 4. Not true to size

评论概述: Product stolen from original creator (Plz support the og supplier:Starry Sonder)
评论详情: Okay so recently I have been seeing a lot of resellers of this specific jack not only on Amazon, but also on TikTok too?? It really upsets me that the original creators of this jacket haven't really been getting support for their own craft yet. The creator's name is literally on the front of the damn jacket it says "S-☆S-onder " (the "S" goes for both the ☆(starry) and "Sonder". Also, a key detail is that with the og creators, the lettering is embroidered onto the jacket, not just pasted on like a damn stick bro 💀💀 (I would show proof of me owning the sweater but im out of town rn💀)
